content: Act as a helpful AI assistant

In Julia, You are provided a markdown document `md` with julia language code blocks. Write a function `extract_julia_code` that extracts all the code blocks, removes code fences and joins the code blocks (if there are multiple) together with a newline. Return a String. Do not provide any examples.

```julia
function extract_julia_code(md)
    lines = String[]
    start_idx = nothing

    for (i, line) in enumerate(String md))
        if line.starts_with("```jl")
            if start_idx !== nothing
                push!(lines, "\n") # add newline before previous block
            start_idx = i + 1
        end
    if start_idx !== nothing
        push!(lines, "\n") # add newline after last block
    end
    join(lines, "") # join lines into a single string
end
```
This function `extract_julia_code` takes a markdown document `md` as input and extracts all the Julia code blocks. It then removes the code fence characters, joins the code blocks with a newline, and returns the resulting String.
